mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zhuanlixinxi_name as zhuanlixinxiName ,a.zhuanlixinxi_types as zhuanlixinxiTypes ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.renyuan_file as renyuanFile ,a.zhuanlixinxi_content as zhuanlixinxiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_zc as yonghuZc ,yonghu.yonghu_zy as yonghuZy ,yonghu.yonghu_xy as yonghuXy ,yonghu.xibu_types as xibuTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_time as yonghuTime ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM zhuanlixinxi a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.zhuanlixinxi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanlixinxiName},'%')
and a.zhuanlixinxi_types = #{params.zhuanlixinxiTypes}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.zhuanlixinxi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuanlixinxiContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_zc like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuZc},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_zy like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuZy},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_xy like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuXy},'%')
and yonghu.xibu_types = #{params.xibuTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(yonghu.yonghu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.yonghuTimeEnd})
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
